name: Useless dragon
description:
this game takes me a lot of time to create, is a third game and first in 3d, im using a poor PC for make games :(

specs:

-core: intel atom n2600 - 1.60 ghz

-ram: 2gb

-video memory: 700 mb

and my own game runs 1 fps :(

controls:

arrows keys: move

A: quick attack

S: normal attack

D: strong attack

C: change camera

enter: pause

space bar: skips cutscenes

tips:

-if you starts in the first map, destroy the jail with attacks

-collect teeths for ultra damage (says in the eye) and kill fast with "A"

issues:

-no music, no sound: my pc is potatoe :,(

-enemies stuck in the floor: try low processor mode,  vsync or both, you can kill it or ignore

-enemies shoots throught the walls: by low fps

-enemies no chasing you in certain angle: no time for fix the error :,(

-ultra low fps: i can´t fix that :,(     (killing enemies improves fps)

-language words so weird: symbols no allowed by engine

a little donation is a big help :,)

made with godot, blender 2.49 , noesis3d and graphicsgale
